title: 85/318/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 June 1985 concerning the zones referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2616/80 instituting a specific Community regional development measure contributing to overcoming constraints on the development of new economic activities in certain zones adversely affected by restructuring of the steel industry (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 11 June 1985
concerning the zones referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2616/80 instituting a specific Community regional development measure contributing to overcoming constraints on the development of new economic activities in certain zones adversely affected by restructuring of the steel industry
(Only the French text is authentic)
(85/318/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The zones referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2616/80 are, in the case of France, as follows:
the départements of Nord, Meurthe-et-Moselle, Moselle, the arrondissements of Autun and Charolles in the département of Saône-et-Loire and the arrondissements of Charleville-Mézières and Sedan in the département of the Ardennes.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 June 1985.
For the Commission
Grigoris VARFIS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 271, 15. 10. 1980, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 27, 31. 1. 1984, p. 9.
(3) OJ No L 228, 13. 8. 1981, p. 14.
